JOB DESCRIPTION: Responsibilities:       3+ years of industry experience in real time embedded telecom systems. The candidate must be proficient in C, and possess good analytic and problem solving skills. Good understanding of real time operating systems concepts, data structures and software development lifecycle      Knowledge and experience in 802.11 wireless protocols MAC protocols implementation is a plus (preferably wireless MAC) Linux Device driver development is a big plus. Teamwork, communication and interpersonal skills.       Required Skillset:       Software design and development for 802.11 Linux driver and 802.11 MAC. Work with cross functional team to understand and define the requirement. Support internal and external customers for all the issues related to 802.11 driver.
